Package com.jme.animation

Class CompactArray<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.animation.CompactArray<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompactFloatArray, CompactQuaternionArray, CompactVector3Array
    public abstract class CompactArray<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements JmeCloneable
    Object is indexed and stored in primitive float[]
    Author:
    Lim, YongHoon
